ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: raiding at full gallop in the early dawn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then those charging in the morning
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: while running during a raid at dawn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of those who raid at dawn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And scouring to the raid at dawn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then those that make raids at morn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And scouring to the raid at dawn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: as they gallop to make raids at dawn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And push home the charge in the morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And scouring to the raid at dawn
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [100:3] by the dawn-raiders, the steeds that make raids against the enemy at dawn at the hands of their riders,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And scouring to the raid at dawn,
